title: Freedmen's Bureau Records: John A. McDonnell to Orlando Brown, April 30, 1867
summary: McDonnell submits a report for all counties in the 9th District, including Augusta County. In this report, he comments on the condition of freed blacks in individual counties, as well as on their general situation in the Valley.
keywords: Administration/Bureaucracy, Aid/Relief, Community Values/Local Behavior, Economy, Education, Employment/Labor, Legal System, Patriotism, Politics/Political Attitudes, Race Relations, Slavery, Violence/Crime, American Civil War
